titleStmt.title: Account concerning the fire and burning of Edenbourgh in Scotland, in a letter from a gentleman there, to his friend in Dublin. : Scotland, February the 12th, 1700.
titleStmt.author: Knowles, Mr.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold next door to the Fleece in St. Nicholas-Street,

notesStmt.note: "To prevent doubts concerning the above relation, the original was received by and is now in the hands of Mr. Knowles ..."
Reproduction of original in: Trinity College Library, Dublin, Ireland.

place.placeName: door to the Fleece in St. Nicholas-Street
